content.question: All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right: A point labeled (a comma b) is marked in quadrant 4, between x equals pi over 2 and x equals pi. The curve begins at a point on the positive y axis, trends down and to the right gradually then steeply through the point (pi over 2 comma 0). The curve continues down and to the right steeply and passes through the labeled point (a comma b). At point (a comma b), the curve continues down and to the right steeply then levels to end at a point in quadrant 4 below the point (pi comma 0). The curve is symmetric about the point (pi over 2 comma 0). The solid line is horizontal. The solid line starts from a point on the negative y axis. The solid line passes through the labeled point (a comma b) and ends below the positive x axis. The curve and the solid line intersect at the labeled point (a comma b). ​The graphs of a trigonometric function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and a line are given in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. The point of intersection <math alttext="open parentheses a comma b close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> occurs where <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals b"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. For which of the following systems of equations could the point <math alttext="open parentheses b comma a close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> be a solution?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open curly brackets table attributes columnalign left end attributes row cell y equals cos to the power of negative 1 end exponent x end cell row cell y equals b end cell end table close "><semantics><mrow><mfenced close="" open="{"><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mi>x</mi></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>b</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced><mspace linebreak="newline"> </mspace></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
